p: Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), which originated in China, is used to maintain health and treat diseases. [ 10] It includes medicinal herbs, prescriptions, Traditional Chinese medicine, tai chi and other contents. Chinese herbs have been used to treat human diseases in China for thousands of years. [ 11] The awarding of part of the 2015 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for Tu Youyou s discovery and development of artemisinin, a potent antimalarial derived from the herbal Artemisia annua, is a clear example and reminder of the potential held by herbal medicine.
